column1: My daughter loves this app she has improved in school from this app. I recommend every parent download this app. I've had this app for 2 years in I really think who ever created this did an amazing job.;
This app is just awesome with up to 9 subject areas all accessible for free. Great from 2 years to 4 years.;
Very useful to my son. Thanks.;
Nice with music. And my son like it;
Used this app 2yrs. Finally just bought a cheap tablet for my kids and this is the first app I am installing on it for them. Very useful app for kids 2-5.;
Great apps ! It really help for my baby boy;
neither entertaining nor interesting for young children.;
The ads make this essentially useless as an educational app.;
Does not correct you on anything.does not teach you to trace correctly.Just click and hear the name of each word/object.good for babiesNo interaction. Memory game is ok.;
kids do not needs these ads;
I just installed,looked at reviews saying too many ads,and uninstalled!! Why do kids games need ads?? Please give your reasons!!
